name: ombi
description:
[{{ project_name|capitalize }}]({{ project_url }}) allows you to host your own Plex Request and user management system.
If you are sharing your Plex server with other users, allow them to request new content using an easy to manage interface!
Manage all your requests for Movies and TV with ease, leave notes for the user and get notification when a user requests something.
Allow your users to post issues against their requests so you know there is a problem with the audio etc.
Even automatically send them weekly newsletters of new content that has been added to your Plex server!

env.description: Specify a timezone to use EG Europe/London

Subfolder can optionally be defined as an env variable for reverse proxies. Keep in mind that once this value is defined, the gui setting for base url no longer works. To use the gui setting, remove this env variable.

readme-vars.project_blurb:
[{{ project_name|capitalize }}]({{ project_url }}) allows you to host your own Plex Request and user management system.
If you are sharing your Plex server with other users, allow them to request new content using an easy to manage interface!
Manage all your requests for Movies and TV with ease, leave notes for the user and get notification when a user requests something.
Allow your users to post issues against their requests so you know there is a problem with the audio etc.
Even automatically send them weekly newsletters of new content that has been added to your Plex server!

development_versions_items.desc: Releases from the `develop` branch of Ombi

param_env_vars.desc: Specify a timezone to use EG Europe/London

opt_param_env_vars.desc: Subfolder can optionally be defined as an env variable for reverse proxies. Keep in mind that once this value is defined, the gui setting for base url no longer works. To use the gui setting, remove this env variable.

readme-vars.app_setup_block: Access the webui at `<your-ip>:3579`. Follow the setup wizard on initial install.  Then configure the required services.

changelogs.desc: Update tarball name, allow for v4 builds in stable.
Update upstream repo. Deprecate `v4-preview` tag, which is merged to `development` tag upstream.
Added an optional env variable for base url setting.
Switching to new Base images, shift to arm32v7 tag.
Clarify info on tags and development builds.
Add info on tags and development builds.
Switch to multi-arch builds and add aarch64 image.
Switch to Ombi v3 stable based on .net core.
Switch to using inhouse mono baseimage.

setup: Access the webui at `<your-ip>:3579`. Follow the setup wizard on initial install.  Then configure the required services.
